page.title: 12A DAY ON THE DOLE
page.content:
{ Elizabeth is 21 years old and is {unemployed. Her husband works.
"I get up at 1pm. every day and I clean the house. I usually go around to my mother-in-law's for my niece and I have her all day. I also go to my mother's; in there I talk and watch the baby. At 5pm I take the baby down the road and go up the road to my own house and make the dinner for my husband coming in. At 6.30 I do my dishes, then watch TV, play cards and go out to my sister-in-law's. I also go back down to my mother's, and at 10.30 I go back to my own house, watch more TV and make my husband something to eat. At 11pm we play cards again and we also watch the TV so we don't get bored. We go to bed about 1am."
